Name: Life after Death
About the game: Life after Death - is a psychological first-person thriller. WARNING : This video game may cause an attack of photosensitive epilepsy to people suffering this disease. A reasonable restriction of the gaming audience is recommended. IMPORTANT NOTE : The main emphasis of the game is on the process of exploration, as the tension slowly builds up, creating an even more complete and vivid effect of presence. ABOUT THIS GAME : You have a chance to return to the period of childhood and live a period of life of the main character, Jessy. One day you will find yourself in an incomprehensible and unknown place, understanding that something is wrong with you and you do not remember anything. As you progress, you will remember the bright moments of your life, overcome the phobias that accompanied you, solve puzzles, and also understand why you ended up here and what happened to you. You need to help Jessy recreate the events that happened earlier, get to know his family and experience everything that he did. -Genre 'Walking Simulator'; - You need to read the notes very careful; -You shall Attentively research locations and pay attention to details and surroundings. DESCRIPTION OF CONTENT FOR ADULTS The developer describes the content like this: The game contains realistic images of scenes of violence that can have a negative impact on the psyche. Some content items may not be suitable for certain age groups.
